channel.title: Video on alper.nl
channel.description: Recent content in Video on alper.nl

item.title: Lazy ass music videos
item.description:
So I get bored on a Friday night and I want a decent way to watch music videos. Rather than look for a service which provides this ((Surely there are a ton of usable music video players online by now.)), I decided to revive our own toy of a couple years ago, so it’s alive (again!): LastTV.

More explanation here. And I guess this blatantly labels me as a programmer, no?

item.title: Some legitimate fear
item.description:
This video on BoingBoing is shocking in its absurdity but hardly unexpected given the current climate. If you pay any attention around you in metropolitan areas in the UK, it is rife with ostentatious surveillance.

What I’m most afraid of is that if we get a significant bombing in the Netherlands, that will be the only excuse necessary to implement these random searches and violations of our civil liberties on Dutch soil. And the populace will swallow it wholesale supported by our MSM ((Formerly a fascist collaborating publication, currently the most popular and most populist newspaper in the Netherlands.)).

item.title: Draplin Design
item.description:
I got a link to this video from somewhere and it is priceless. It prompted me to do some research and I found an interview which confirms that that Aaron Draplin guy is awesome and does really cool work.

(This post mostly for the benefit of my designer friends.)
